Description: Anonymous identifier for each participant (6 uppercase letters).
Experimental list number (1-8). Items were distributed across 8 lists.
Unique identifier for the item/stimulus. Same item has the same trial_id across all participants who saw it.
Presentation order within the session (0-indexed). The order in which the participant saw this trial.
The sentence fragment presented to the participant (cloze context).
The normatively expected next word (from corpus).
The word written by the participant as the expected continuation.
Age of the participant at the time of the experiment.
Self-reported gender identity of the participant (Male/Female).
Highest completed education level of the participant.
